en-US.summary: Skill that translates English into Pittsburghese.
examplePhrases: Alexa tell pittsburghese translator to translate I am going downtown
Alexa tell pittsburghese translator to say what you are guys doing
en-US.name: pittsburghese_translator
en-US.description: Ever wanted to talk like a born and raised Pittsburgher? Well, this app can help you practice. It will translate any phrase you say into Pittsburghese. Note: a phrase might not have a distinct Pittsburghese translate so you might just hear the same phrase repeated back to you.
